item.description:
@Cres wrote:

I Vain I:

Maybe they have ring of wealth, and you don’t?

ring of wealth would only affect armour drops , not artefacts , i should have gotten 2 - 3 more artefacts , needless to say they’ve reduced the drop rate for F2P

EDIT : im getting ready for some more trips , add me if you want to come too , Xezerea

item.title: Forinthry Dungeon , comparisation
item.dc:creator: @Cres Cres
item.description:
@Cres wrote:

lets compare the drops of the revenants in the new forinthry dungeon between members and F2P
i’ve been camping the revs for the entire week in F2P and i’ve only gotten 1 artefact worth 250k
whilst ive seen people in members get 2 vesta armour drops in 1 trip ;

why , the fuck , would they decrease drop rate for F2P?
1 item / 7 days
2 items / 1 day

seems kinda fucked up to me…

Read full topic
